name: endurain
description: Endurain is a self-hosted training log for endurance sports such as running and cycling. It tracks workouts, distances, and performance metrics over time, giving athletes insight into their training volume and trends.
features: Training Log: Track workouts for running and cycling. Comprehensive activity records.
Performance Metrics: Monitor distance, pace, and progress. Data-driven training.
Trend Analysis: Visualize training volume over time. Understand your improvement.
Endurance Focus: Designed specifically for endurance athletes. Speaks your language.
Personal Records: Track PRs and achievements. Celebrate your progress.
Self-Hosted: Keep your training data private. Your fitness, your control.
